<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lemma of Vision](/Feats.aspx?ID=2479) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 76 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've solved a tiny stepping stone in your self-discovery, awakening new depths in your sight. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Lemma of Vision
